title: 43: The Myth Blasting Episode (March Edition)
itunes:title: The Myth Blasting Episode (March Edition)
description: It’s time to go MYTH BLASTING with Hungry Girl!! In this episode Lisa is joined by her pal, Dr. Robert J. Davis aka “The Healthy Skeptic” and they’re blasting MYTHS like; does Apple Cider Vinegar really help you lose weight? Is sparkling water full of sodium? Is Matcha a miracle tea? Is non-dairy milk really better for you? All these questions and so much more will be answered in this episode!! TUNE IN NOW! [www.hungry-girl.com/foodcast](http://hungry-girl.com/foodcast)
